sentence.Network_en: The tragedy is developed form the bacchanal doxology as one part of the fete ceremony of Dionysus.
sentence.Network_cn: 悲剧作为狄俄尼索斯祭祀仪式的一部分，是由酒神颂歌发展而来的。

sentence.Network_en: From another perspective, Dionysus and Pentheus are each other's alter ego.
sentence.Network_cn: 从另一个角度看, 对立的双方又是彼此的另一个自我.

sentence.Network_en: Greek mythology a woman participant in the orgiastic rites of Dionysus.
sentence.Network_cn: (希腊神话)参与狄俄尼索斯的狂欢仪式的女人.
